item.title: Learning Elm with 2048 game
item.description: During my stint at Acko, we were using Elm in parts of our codebase but I never got the chance to extensively work on any Elm project. I was intrigued with the language (optimized for developer’s happiness, they say), and so I decided to try it out. To validate my learning, I decided to build a simple app, but not another TODO app. Here comes: 2048 2048 Game 2048 is a game created by gabrielecirulli which went viral in 2014.
